title: The Tenant Of Wildfell Hall
description: New edition of Anne Brontë's most shocking and enduring novel, to tie in with the upcoming film Brontë . Anne Brontë was born in 1820, the youngest of the Brontë family. Her first novel was Agnes Grey , and it was followed by The Tenant of Wildfell Hall in 1848, written under a pseudonym. She died in 1849.
author: Anne Brontë
